SEARCH
Module com.cyslide
Package com.cyslide.Model

Class EmptyTile

java.lang.Object
com.cyslide.Model.Tile
com.cyslide.Model.EmptyTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class EmptyTile extends Tile
Represents an empty tile in the CySlide game. EmptyTile extends the Tile class and represents a tile with no number on it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EmptyTile(int posX, int posY)
    Constructs an empty tile object with the specified position.

    • mouvementAvailable

      public boolean mouvementAvailable(int x, int y, String direction, RectangleWithLabel[][] table)
      Checks if a movement is available for the empty tile in the specified direction on the game table.
      Specified by:
      mouvementAvailable in class Tile
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the empty tile.
      y - The y-coordinate of the empty tile.
      direction - The direction to check for movement.
      table - The game table represented by a two-dimensional array of RectangleWithLabel objects.
      Returns:
      True if a movement is available, false otherwise.
